testcase.classname: Camera Setup Workflow Integration Tests › 1. Complete Camera Setup Flow
testcase.name: should complete full setup flow from credentials to completion

testcase.name: should persist state between page refreshes

testcase.name: should handle network scan with multiple network interfaces

testcase.name: should properly detect Axis cameras using POST method

testcase.name: should push configuration to camera via VAPIX

testcase.name: should identify speakers by audio endpoint

testcase.name: should store discovered speakers for later configuration

testcase.classname: Camera Setup Workflow Integration Tests › 3. Speaker Configuration
testcase.name: should mark step 4 as completed after speaker configuration

testcase.classname: Camera Setup Workflow Integration Tests › 4. License Activation
testcase.name: should activate license with correct MAC address

testcase.classname: Camera Setup Workflow Integration Tests › 4. License Activation
testcase.name: should not use hardcoded MAC address

testcase.classname: Camera Setup Workflow Integration Tests › 5. Audio Playback Integration
testcase.name: should handle pre-fetched audio data on first load

testcase.name: should convert PCM audio to WAV format

testcase.classname: Camera Setup Workflow Integration Tests › 5. Audio Playback Integration
testcase.name: should handle both MP3 and PCM audio formats

testcase.name: should recover from network scan failures

testcase.name: should handle corrupted localStorage gracefully

testcase.classname: Camera Setup Workflow Integration Tests › 6. Error Recovery and Resilience
testcase.name: should handle camera connection failures

testcase.name: should update state atomically

testcase.name: should maintain state consistency across components

testcase.name: should clean up state on "Start Fresh Setup"
